name: Solar System (itch) (SafetySalamander)
description:
This is my Solar System project. I added the following elements:

  1. New planets:
    1. Venus
    2. Mars
    3. Pluto
  2. The "Pew":  A prefab asset that represents a fast moving light beam (laser)
  3. The "Pewpew": A prefab that spawns a short series of "Pews" (laser burst) abusing the Projectile script
  4. The "Pewpew Spawner": attached to the main camera this object shoots a laser burst at the selected object each time you click at an object. Todo so I played arround a bit and created the LookAtTargetAndSpawn script.

Credits

Created by Fredrik Kamphuis
